Name: Honey Bee Mine
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Honey and vanilla laced with white rum and charged with champagne. Perfect for Valentine's Day.
History: Created February 2014 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Honey Bee Mine contains 183 calories
